roleset.name: to take apart
roleset.note: DISMANTLE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'dismantle' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from dismantle.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: Congress-1 still is struggling [*-1] to dismantle the unpopular Catastrophic Care Act of 1988 , which [*T*-39]boosted benefits for the elderly and [*-2] taxed them [*-3] to pay for the new coverage .
example.arg: the unpopular Catastrophic Care Act of 1988 , which [*T*-39] boosted benefits for the elderly and [*-2]taxed them [*-3] to pay for the new coverage
